mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_PAYMENT( M_NO, PAY_PROD_NAME, PAY_PERIOD, PAY_AMOUNT, PAY_METHOD) VALUES (#{m_no}, #{pay_prod_name}, #{pay_period}, #{pay_amount}, #{pay_method} )
mapper.select: SELECT m_no FROM TBL_PAYMENT WHERE DATE(pay_expired_date) = CURRENT_DATE()
mapper.update: UPDATE TBL_MEMBER M JOIN TBL_PAYMENT P ON M.m_no = P.m_no SET M.M_GRADE = 0 WHERE DATE(P.PAY_EXPIRED_DATE) = CURRENT_DATE();
